name: Paragon Profile
author: Kingsley Paragon

sections.description:
Paragon profile is the WordPress plugin that makes registration and login even easier. All pages, login, registration, password recovery, contact page are created automatically during plugin installation. You don’t have to place these shortcode here or there.
Just install and start using the plugin.
Wordpress Login, Registration, Profile, Password Recovery, Secure Ajax Forms, styled to your need, with options to adjust colors, All bootstrap. Wooh!!

Purpose

This plugin was created to solve issues with login, registration, contact page for simple websites, if you want users to register and use your website, you may want the registration process to be hassle free. I designed a plugin that helps users to resell SMS via wordpress but how do they get users to register on their wordpress site and use the services? This plugin is the answer to that question.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Paragon Profile settings to configure the plugin
  4. By default, all the required pages are created during plugin activation.
sections.faq:
How does the plugin create pages

The plugin create pages via wordpress shortcode
[ppprofile] = profile page
[pplogin] = login page
[ppregister] = registration page
[ppcontact] = contact page
[pppasswordrecovery] = password recovery

Note: You do not need to create these pages, the pages are created automatically during plugin activation.

Want to create logout button

There is a shortcode for that
[ppdoshutdownbtn]
